featured.text: The baby panda Yuan Zai at the Taipei Zoo was separated from her mother because of a minor injury that occurred during her birth.
He frequently ordered blood tests and X-rays, and repeatedly referred her to specialists for even minor complaints.

definition.zh_def: 未成年人；小的，次要的，輕微的
definition.en_def: A person under the age of full legal responsibility; something of lesser importance.
definition.example: The minor was not allowed to enter the club without an adult.
